sentences.en: a mythical creature like the Minotaur
sentences.cn: 像弥诺陶洛斯这类神话故事中的怪物

sentences.en: Briefly Andrew sketched out a mythical situation paralleling his own real one.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁描绘了一幅同他自己的处境相类似的虚构图画.

sentences.en: Brooks , F . The Mythical man - month: Essays on software engineering . Addison - Wesley , 1995.
sentences.cn: 这是软件工程的经典著作《人月神话》.

sentences.en: From this union was born Aeneas, the mythical ancestor of the Roman people.
sentences.cn: 他们结合后生下艾尼阿斯, 他是神话中说的罗马人的祖先.

sentences.en: Great achievements for a man who for nearly 5 000 years was thought to be mythical.
sentences.cn: 这位近5000年来被视为神话人物的国王曾经创立了非凡的业绩.

sentences.en: Is he overly attached to his mother and her mythical apron strings?
sentences.cn: 是否他过度依附在他母亲和她神圣般的围裙绳里?

sentences.en: Providence had grown mythical in his thoughts, if not malicious.
sentences.cn: 他头脑中产生了一种奇怪的, 如果不是恶意的深谋远虑.

sentences.en: Sigurd, like his mythical relatives in Norse and Greek stories, was unfaithful in his loves.
sentences.cn: 与北欧和希腊神话故事中的其他英雄一样, 西格德对爱也不专一.

sentences.en: Start living life here and now instead of waiting for that mythical day when you'll be slim.
sentences.cn: 就在此时此地开始积极地生活,而不要坐等你想像中变苗条的那一天.

sentences.en: Such as a magical tree, a golden rooster , and other mythical items.
sentences.cn: 一课神奇的树, 一只金色的雄鸡和其它一些宝物.

sentences.en: The mythical ferocious animal meal make a guess of!
The sculpture is the mythical unicorn.
sentences.cn: 这雕塑就是神话中的独角兽.

sentences.en: The space between the stars is not some mythical void at all.
sentences.cn: 恒星际空间根本不是人们凭空想象的虚空.
他们的财富完全是虚构的.

sentences.en: This would make these skills quasi mythical.
sentences.cn: 这使得这些技能极其的神秘.

sentences.en: Young people in China, Yu Minhong a mythical magic.
sentences.cn: 在中国的年轻人中, 俞敏洪有着神话般的魔力.

words.tran_cn: 神话的；神话学的；虚构的
神话；虚构的人，虚构的事
写神话；当做神话；把……解释为神话

trans.tran_en: existing only in an ancient story
